data.chText: 血汗工厂，血汗工场（工资低廉、劳动条件恶劣）
data.enText: a place where people work for low wages in poor conditions

means: 血汗工厂，血汗工场(工资低廉、劳动条件恶劣)

tr: factory where workers do piecework for poor pay and are prevented from forming unions

value.def: If you describe a small factory as a sweatshop, you mean that many people work there in poor conditions for low pay.

example.ex: ...the dingy, hidden world of garment sweatshops.
example.tran: 肮脏隐蔽的血汗服装工厂

value.tran: 血汗工厂(工作条件恶劣、工资低的小工厂)
